TopicTitle: What's up with the weekly update? :)

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

Please don't take this as a complaint, i'm just curious, i've just had a month of my life chewed up by EVE online so i'm in kind of a daze, once a week i popped over to see how my favourite little game of the past few years is progressing, but i don't see any new updates, are they being aired somewhere else like on Twitch TV maybe? Thanks for any answers

Never mind

Edited December 3, 2013 by Quinantine
Updates are now posted daily on the Dev Tumblr account. http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/

Updates are now posted daily on the Dev Tumblr account. http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/

Ahhh crud, that's why i been missing it, thank you mate.

I was wondering this as well until now. Did anyone mention this at all? Tumblr what the hell is that? I dont have any intention of going and registering with yet another crappy site to get my news with yet another password that I will forget - Facebook will do fine which is where I get all my gaming news. If Squad dont want to communicate through the biggest social communication site then they are a load of idiots.

How to shoot yourselves in the foot marketing wise - follow these guys! .... bloody Tumblr! Get a grip guys, who goes to these places except for computer geek fanatics?

Edited December 3, 2013 by nats

Facebook will do fine which is where I get all my gaming news. If Squad dont want to communicate through the biggest social communication site then they are a load of idiots.

Uhh, they actually do communicate on FB. Although it could be more.

Clam down, buddy!

I understand that you want some news but there's no need to offend anyone.

Good thing that they still do the DevNews. I thought they needed a break, but I just wonder why they don't post them on the forums of left a note where to find them.

Woah - take it easy Nats.

As Blizzy pointed out, the Daily Kerbal has you covered. Also, unless I'm missing something, there's no need to get a Tumblr account to view the blog, although I'm guessing you do need one if you want to follow it.

Off-topic - is that an Elite: Dangerous avatar I spy?

You can follow KSP on many places! Facebook and Twitter for example, or indeed the dev blog on Tumblr where the Daily Kerbal is posted. The Daily Kerbal has replaced the Weekly report and gives you more or less the same content (plus some more) in bite sized chunks over the course of the week. You don't have to sign up for Tumblr to follow it because the blog is automatically reposted to our own forums: link. Alternatively you can use an RSS feed from the blog to keep up to date

Uhh, they actually do communicate on FB. Although it could be more.

What would you like to see more of on the Facebook front?

What would you like to see more of on the Facebook front?

For one, I don't think the Daily Kerbals are there.
just FYI everything posted to the tumbler is also posted here on the forums. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/70-The-Daily-Kerbal
